name: Salsa
keywords: cilantro, onion, tomato, side dish, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup finely chopped white or Spanish onions
2 cups unpeeled, unseeded, cored tomato cut into 1/4-inch cubes
1 1/2 teaspoons or more finely chopped fresh, seeded jalapeno peppers
1/4 cup finely chopped fresh coriander leaves

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all the ingredients in a mixing bowl and blend well. Refrigerate until ready to serve.
